DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patient randomize cardiopulmonary rehabilitation program ( Rehab ; n = 10 ) usual care ( Control ; n = 10 ) . The randomization do Graphpad StatMate computerized program . Those patient assign Control follow physician , receive routine nursing assistance , visit daily one investigator ( CPM ) , expose specific respiratory motor physical intervention . Those randomized Rehab receive medical nursing care , follow structured physical therapy program twice day .
